General.Name: Izertis Sa
General.Description: izertis, S.A. provides technological consultancy services in Spain and internationally. The company offers digital strategy consultancy, data driven marketing, ecommerce, inbound marketing and social media, creativity and activation branding, UX / UI designing, and marketing automation and lead nurturing services. It also designs, plans, and executes traffic acquisition strategies that help generate leads or commercial opportunities. In addition, it provides hyper automation and control; data-based predictive analytics for business decision making; business transformation; software solutions; enterprise and IT governance; technological infrastructures; and cybersecurity solutions, as well as quality assurance services. It serves banking, finance, and fintech; insurance; mutual insurances; construction and real estate; public admin; health; pharma; telco; media; energy and utilities; industry; services; tourism, travel, and leisure; and retail, logistics, and distribution sectors. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Gijón, Spain.
General.Address: Parque CientIfico TecnolOgico Zona Intra, Gijón, Spain, 33203
